00046         private function rechercheFils($pid_parent)
00047         {
00048                 $tableau = array(); //tableau contenant tous les sous-dossiers trouvés...
00049                 
00050                 $tableau_temp = array(); //tableau intermédiaire contenant les sous-dossiers à stocker
00051                 
00052                 //Requête pour trouver tous les sous-dossiers du dossier courant
00053                 $select_fields_pid = 'pages.uid';
00054                 $from_table_pid = 'pages';
00055                 $where_clause_pid = 'pages.pid='.$pid_parent;
00056                 $groupBy_pid = '';
00057                 $orderBy_pid = '';
00058                 $limit_pid = '';
00059                 $tryMemcached_pid = '';
00060 
00061                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($select_fields_pid, $from_table_pid, $where_clause_pid, $groupBy_pid, $orderBy_pid, $tryMemcached_pid);
00062 
00063                 while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res))
00064                 {
00065                         $pid_courant = $row['uid'];
00066 
00067 
00068                         //On stocke l'uid courant dans le tableau
00069                         $taille_tableau = count($tableau);
00070                                                 
00071                         $tableau[$taille_tableau] = $pid_courant;
00072 
00073                         $tableau_temp = $this->rechercheFils($pid_courant);
00074 
00075                         foreach ($tableau_temp as $value) {
00076                                 $taille_tableau = count($tableau);
00077                                         
00078                                 $tableau[$taille_tableau] = $value;
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081                 return $tableau;
00082         }

00097         private function rechercherUidLangue($uid,$sys_language_uid,$uid_parent,$texte_champ,$table,$nom_champ)
00098         {
00099                 $texte=$texte_champ;
00100                 //On teste si le libellé est déjà dans la bonne langue...
00101                 if ($sys_language_uid<>$GLOBALS['TSFE']->sys_language_content)
00102                 {
00103                         $uid_recherche=$uid;
00104                         $trouve=false;
00105                         // Si on a l'id du parent
00106                         if($uid_parent<>'0')
00107                         {
00108 
00109                                 //Requête pour trouver les infos du parent
00110                                 $select_fields_uid = $table.'.uid, '.$table.'.sys_language_uid, '.$table.'.'.$nom_champ;
00111                                 $from_table_uid = $table;
00112                                 $where_clause_uid = $table.'.uid='.$pid_parent.' AND '.$table.'.deleted<>1';
00113                                 $groupBy_uid = '';
00114                                 $orderBy_uid = '';
00115                                 $limit_uid = '';
00116                                 $tryMemcached_uid = '';
00117 
00118                                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($select_fields_uid, $from_table_uid, $where_clause_uid, $groupBy_uid, $orderBy_uid, $tryMemcached_uid);
00119 
00120                                 while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res))
00121                                 {
00122                                         if($row['sys_language_uid']==$GLOBALS['TSFE']->sys_language_content)
00123                                         {
00124                                                 $texte=$row[$nom_champ];
00125                                                 $trouve=true;
00126                                         }
00127                                         else
00128                                         {
00129                                                 $uid_recherche=$row['uid'];
00130                                         }
00131                                 }
00132                         }
00133                         
00134                         if($trouve==false)
00135                         {
00136                                 //Requête pour trouver les infos du parent
00137                                 $select_fields_uid = $table.'.uid, '.$table.'.sys_language_uid, '.$table.'.'.$nom_champ;
00138                                 $from_table_uid = $table;
00139                                 $where_clause_uid = $table.'.l18n_parent='.$uid_recherche.' AND '.$table.'.deleted<>1';
00140                                 $groupBy_uid = '';
00141                                 $orderBy_uid = '';
00142                                 $limit_uid = '';
00143                                 $tryMemcached_uid = '';
00144 
00145                                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery($select_fields_uid, $from_table_uid, $where_clause_uid, $groupBy_uid, $orderBy_uid, $tryMemcached_uid);
00146 
00147                                 while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res))
00148                                 {
00149                                         if($row['sys_language_uid']==$GLOBALS['TSFE']->sys_language_content)
00150                                         {
00151                                                 $texte=$row[$nom_champ];
00152                                         }
00153                                 }
00154                         }
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 return $texte;
00158         }

00167         private function equipe($uid_equipes,$typeDate)
00168         {
00169                         //Création de la contrainte permettant l'affichage que de certains types de postes...
00170                         $equipes='';
00171         
00172 
00173                         if($uid_equipes<>'')
00174                         {
00175                                 $equipes=' AND ( ';
00176                                 $premier=true;
00177 
00178                                 $tableau_equipes = Explode(",",$uid_equipes);
00179 
00180                                 foreach ($tableau_equipes as $equipe_courante) {
00181                                         if ($premier <> true)
00182                                         {
00183                                                 $equipes = $equipes.' OR ';
00184                                         }
00185                                         else
00186                                         {
00187                                                 $premier=false;
00188                                         }
00189                                         $equipes=$equipes.'tx_ligestmembrelabo_Equipe.uid='.$equipe_courante;
00190                                 }
00191 
00192                                 $equipes = $equipes.' )';
00193 
00194                         }
00195                         
00196                         
00197                         //Gestion des dates...
00198                         if($typeDate=='Actuels')
00199                         {
00200                                 $postes = $postes.' AND tx_ligestmembrelabo_EstMembreDe.DateDebut<="'.date('Y-m-d').'" AND (tx_ligestmembrelabo_EstMembreDe.DateFin>="'.date('Y-m-d').'" OR tx_ligestmembrelabo_EstMembreDe.DateFin="0000-00-00")';
00201                         }
00202                         else if($typeDate=='Anciens')
00203                         {
00204                                 $postes = $postes.' AND tx_ligestmembrelabo_EstMembreDe.DateFin<"'.date('Y-m-d').'" AND tx_ligestmembrelabo_EstMembreDe.DateFin<>"0000-00-00"';

00206                         
00207

00209                         return $equipes;

00523         function main($content,$conf)   {
00524                 //Initialisation
00525                 $this->conf=$conf;
00526                 $this->pi_initPIflexForm(); // Init and get the flexform data of the plugin
00527                 $this->lConf = array(); // Setup our storage array...
00528                 $this->lConf2 = array();
00529                 $this->lConftotal = array();
00530                 // Assign the flexform data to a local variable for easier access
00531                 $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00532                 $piFlexForm = $this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'];
00533                  // Traverse the entire array based on the language...
00534                  // and assign each configuration option to $this->lConf array...
00535 
00536                 foreach ( $piFlexForm['data'] as $sheet => $data )
00537                 {
00538                         foreach ( $data as $lang => $value )
00539                         {
00540                                 foreach ( $value as $key => $val )
00541                                 {
00542                                         $this->lConf[$key] = $this->pi_getFFvalue($piFlexForm, $key, $sheet);                   
00543 
00544 
00545                                         if(ereg('groupe',$key)){
00546                                                 $temp = $key;
00547                                                 foreach ($val as $key2 => $val2 )
00548                                                 {
00549                                                         $temp = $temp.'/'.$key2;
00550                                                         foreach ($val2 as $key3 => $val3 )
00551                                                         {
00552                                                                 $this->lConf[$key3] = $this->pi_getFFvalue($piFlexForm, $key.'/'.$key2.'/'.$key3, $sheet);
00553                                                         }
00554                                                 }
00555                 
00556                                         
00557                                         }
00558                                 }
00559 
00560                         }
00561 
00562                 }
00563                 //$this->lConftotal = array_merge($this->lConf,$this->lConf2);
00564 
00565                 $this->pi_loadLL();
00566 
00567                 //Gestion de gabarits (Template)
00568 
00569                 $this->templateCode = $this->cObj->fileResource($this->lConf["template_file"]);
00570 
00571                 $template = array();
00572 
00573                 $template['total'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->templateCode, '###TEMPLATE###');
00574 
00575                 $template['item'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['total'], '###ITEM###');
00576 
00577                 $template['categories'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###CATEGORIES###');
00578                 $template['categories_dernier'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###CATEGORIES_DERNIER###');
00579 
00580                 $template['equipe'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###EQUIPE###');
00581                 $template['equipe_dernier'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###EQUIPE_DERNIER###');
00582 
00583                 $template['diplomes'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###DIPLOMES###');
00584                 $template['diplomes_dernier'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###DIPLOMES_DERNIER###');
00585 
00586                 $template['postes'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###POSTES###');
00587                 $template['postes_dernier'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###POSTES_DERNIER###');
00588 
00589                 $template['fonctions_structures'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###FONCTIONS_STRUCTURES###');
00590                 $template['fonctions_structures_dernier'] = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template['item'], '###FONCTIONS_STRUCTURES_DERNIER###');
00591 
00592 
00593                 //Exemple de création de requêtes
00594                 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00595                 //Création de requête
00596                 $select_fields = '*';
00597                 $from_table = 'test';
00598                 $where_clause = '';
00599                 $groupBy = '';
00600                 $orderBy = 'champ1';
00601                 $limit = '';
00602                 $tryMemcached = '';
00603

00605

00607                 {
00608                         $test = $test.$row['champ1'].' ';
00609                 }
00610 
00611                 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00612                 $select_fields = '';
00613                 $from_table = '';
00614                 $where_clause = '';
00615                 $groupBy = '';
00616                 $orderBy = '';
00617                 $limit = '';
00618                 $tryMemcached = '';

00625                         $code = ''; //Variable contenant le code à afficher
00626

00628                         $select = 'DISTINCT tx_ligestmembrelabo_MembreDuLabo.uid AS uidmembre, tx_ligestmembrelabo_MembreDuLabo.*';
00629                         $table = 'tx_ligestmembrelabo_MembreDuLabo';

00637                                 $where = $where.' AND tx_ligestmembrelabo_EstMembreDe.deleted<>1 AND tx_ligestmembrelabo_Equipe.deleted<>1 AND (tx_ligestmembrelabo_Equipe.Nom = "'.$this->lConf['labo'].'" OR tx_ligestmembrelabo_Equipe.Abreviation = "'.$this->lConf['labo'].'")';
